subject: Re: [junit] automation tool for GUI testing ...
msgSnippet: soup, http://soup.sourceforge.net is a tool for testing Java GUIs. You can find some others at: http://www.junit.org/news/extension/gui/index.htm Eclipse,
messageBody:
soup, http://soup.sourceforge.net is a tool for testing Java GUIs. You can
find some others at: http://www.junit.org/news/extension/gui/index.htm

Eclipse, www.eclipse.org, the IDE does support JUnit. As a matter of fact,
the version 2.0 comes with version 3.7.

Paulo.
----- Original Message -----
From: "Pradeep Bojan" <pbojan@...>
To: <junit@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, March 20, 2003 1:12 AM
Subject: [junit] automation tool for GUI testing ...


> Is there any tool for automating GUI, designed by eclipse. I basically
need
> it for doing regression testing. Junit doesn't support eclipse. Please
> let me know.
>
> Regards,
>
> Pradeep.
>
